channel.title: Icey Realm
channel.description:
Introduction Icey Realm is back, finally. It once was a fun server 'even though it had crappy features' it was fun and people enjoyed it because i would listen to their concerns day by day, and i would make updates to their suggestions. [I]That[/I] is what I am to do again. :) This server was mildly popular when it was out and was very fun :D I will most likely not be purchasing a dedicated unless there is a significant number of players online then I most certainly will, but upon release it will just be hosted off my computer. 'which can support roughly 40-50 people without crashing' I have also learned much about coding. I have a few friends helping me. -Syntax -Unk0wn They occasionally help me if i run into a tough time or i simply cannot figure something out :)
This server will feature: [SIZE="2"]All skills 100% to the best of my abilities :D -- all that are with a 317 that doesn't include summoning, hunter, construction.
Fun minigames -- pest control -- mage arena -- fight pits -- jad -- barrows
Friendly staff, considering, caring -- taking suggestions into consideration -- asking about problemed situations
Updates March 13, 2009 - Pickpocketing base which gives the exact same loot as rs, with slightly different amounts, and naturally a higher exp rate.
March 15, 2009 - Full werewolf agility course, with correct emotes. - thanks viper.
Skills Melee Combat - 75% Prayer - 25% Ranging - 100% Maging - 90% Runecrafting - 100% Agility - 100% Herblore - 100% Thieving - 50% Crafting - 0% Fletching - 0% Slayer - 0% Mining - 0% Smithing - 0% Fishing - 0% Cooking - 0% Firemaking - 0% Woodcutting - 0% Farming - 0%
Minigames Pest Control - 100% Barrows - 100% Fight Pits - 0% Jad - 0% Castle Wars - 0% Please suggest other minigames 'I wont do duel arena, bounty hunter, rogues den' yet
My youtube account is www.youtube.com/iceyclient
Finally, if there is any suggestions they will gladly be taken :D Please do not flame me :/ its pointless to especially since this server is far from complete.
If you wish to contact me, my msn account is [email]iceywhip@hotmail.com[/email] also if anyone would like to make a kick ass title with icey realm in it in a cool cyan-light blue ice color with cool stuff going on aka a icey realm sig, that would be tight :D

item.title: Icey Realm
item.dc:creator: @iceywhip69 iceywhip69
item.description:
@iceywhip69 wrote:

Introduction
Icey Realm is back, finally. It once was a fun server ‘even though it had crappy features’ it was fun and people enjoyed it because i would listen to their concerns day by day, and i would make updates to their suggestions. That is what I am to do again. This server was mildly popular when it was out and was very fun I will most likely not be purchasing a dedicated unless there is a significant number of players online then I most certainly will, but upon release it will just be hosted off my computer. ‘which can support roughly 40-50 people without crashing’ I have also learned much about coding. I have a few friends helping me.
-Syntax
-Unk0wn
They occasionally help me if i run into a tough time or i simply cannot figure something out

This server will feature:
[SIZE=“2”]All skills 100% to the best of my abilities
– all that are with a 317 that doesn’t include summoning, hunter, construction.

Fun minigames
– pest control
– mage arena
– fight pits
– jad
– barrows

Friendly staff, considering, caring
– taking suggestions into consideration
– asking about problemed situations

Updates
March 13, 2009

  • Pickpocketing base which gives the exact same loot as rs, with slightly different amounts, and naturally a higher exp rate.

March 15, 2009

  • Full werewolf agility course, with correct emotes.
  • thanks viper.

Skills
Melee Combat - 75%
Prayer - 25%
Ranging - 100%

Please suggest other minigames ‘I wont do duel arena, bounty hunter, rogues den’ yet

My youtube account is www.youtube.com/iceyclient

Finally, if there is any suggestions they will gladly be taken
Please do not flame me its pointless to especially since this server is far from complete.

If you wish to contact me, my msn account is iceywhip@hotmail.com
also if anyone would like to make a kick ass title with icey realm in it in a cool cyan-light blue ice color with cool stuff going on aka a icey realm sig, that would be tight
